resources.string: Initializing app for the first time…
Network Error, please close app and reopen when you have an internet connection.
Add assets to your portfolio. Get started by tapping on the search icon in the top right corner of the screen.
Add assets to your watchlist. Get started by tapping on the search icon in the top right corner of the screen.
Add an asset pair. Get started by tapping the add button below.
It is recommended to have a good data connection before starting an update.
Are you sure you want to remove this asset from your portfolio?
Are you sure you want to remove this asset pair?
Donations are appreciated!\nTap an item to view in more detail
Select which currency should be used to display prices.
Force app to reload all data
